reviewText:
- I love Iron man 
It was my favorite show ever
Sorry to see the series end but a decent ending just the same!  Bood CGI at times and good action sequences.
One of the most awesome ironman series ever. This series should be owned by all ironman fans. A lot of great guess star appearances.

Since apparently we're not reviewing the product, just assigning stars as an indicator of whether or not we plan to purchase this specific version. I'll give it 5 stars, since I have the other 3 volumes of Season 2.

Though I don't plan to buy it, I'll refrain from giving the upcoming Full Season 2 DVDs a 1 star rating, because that would be silly.

This DVD includes the final 8 episodes of Season 2. The run time is 143 minutes. This is great for those that already own the other DVDs but need this to complete their collection of Season 2. Also, great for those younger fans!
Episodes:
1. CONTROL-ALT-DELETE
2. DOOMSDAY
3. THE HAMMER FALLS
4. RAGE OF THE HULK
5. IRON MONGER LIVES
6. THE DRAGONSEED
7. THE MAKLUAN INVASION PART 1: ANNIHILATE!
8. THE MAKLUAN INVASION PART 2: UNITE!

Initially Amazon had a run time at 66 minutes, with the corrected information I have updated my review to 5 stars and I am looking forward to the release of Iron Man: Armored Adventures, Complete Season 2 on April 23, 2013.

Looks like this vol. has only 3 episodes, I plan on waiting till the full season is released in one set.

Following addendum added on March 5, 2013:

The series is a high quality. The last episode aired in the USA on July 25, 2012. Volume 4 is being released on April 23, 2013, nearly 21 months after the series ended. This is another case where pursuit of a profit for the company outweighs supplying the consumer with a quality and cost effective product.

Overall I standby my assessment of this product and will wait for the complete season to be released in one collection. Season 2 is also being released on April 23, 2013.
